Parameters: MediaDrm: the MediaDrm object on which the event occurred This value must never be null.
byte: the DRM session ID on which the event occurred This value must never be null.
List: a list of @B_android#media#MediaDrm#KeyStatus_E@ instances indicating the status for each key in the session This value must never be null.
boolean: indicates if a key has been added that is usable, which may trigger an attempt to resume playback on the media stream if it is currently blocked waiting for a key.
onKeyStatusChange(android.media.MediaDrm.Description: Called when the keys in a session change status, such as when the license is renewed or expires.
onKeyStatusChange(android.media.MediaDrm.FullName: public abstract void onKeyStatusChange (MediaDrm md, byte[] sessionId, List<MediaDrm.KeyStatus> keyInformation, boolean hasNewUsableKey)

ClassDesc: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the keys in a drm session change states.
